## Checklist

### All PRs
- [ ] `npm run typecheck` passes
- [ ] `npm run build:lib` succeeds
- [ ] `npm run build` succeeds (showcase)

### New component PRs
- [ ] Four-file structure: `Component.tsx`, `Component.types.ts`, `Component.module.css`, `index.ts`
- [ ] Barrel export added to `src/index.ts`
- [ ] Showcase page created in `src/showcase/pages/`
- [ ] Entry added to `src/showcase/registry.ts`
- [ ] Page wired in `src/showcase/pages/index.ts`
- [ ] Uses semantic tokens (`--aw-sys-*`), no raw color values
- [ ] Props follow existing conventions (variant, accent, size, etc.)

### Visual changes
